name: api_delete_dns_domain
description: Deletes a Domain from our DNS servers

function.name: api_delete_dns_domain
function.desc: Deletes a Domain from our DNS servers

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

domain_id.name: domain_id
domain_id.description: The ID of the domain in question.

return.name: return
return.description: will return true if it succeeded, or false if there was some type of error.

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param domain_id int The ID of the domain in question.
